verbs.description: [V: is] frees six syria druze women children after three - month ordeal the islamic state group has released two women and four children among 27 surviving druze hostages it seized during a deadly july attack on the minority community heartland in southern syria druze rami abdel rahman assault syria euphrates valley iraq yasser arafat tulul al - safa islamic state rasmia abu amar syrian government islamic state group sdf syrian army three - month syrian observatory hajin syrian democratic forces afp russia sweida
